translation.en: Time in the alley feels like a lifetime.
translation.es: El tiempo en ese pasillo parece una eternidad.

translation.en: Think through my run, what it needs to look like,
translation.es: RODEO LITTLE BRITCHES Pienso en la corrida, cómo debe verse,

translation.en: - Get Power and I in sync. -
Some riders cut out all the noise in the arena,
translation.es: Algunos jinetes se aíslan de todo sonido del ruedo

translation.en: hearing only their own breath and the breath of their horse.
translation.es: y solo escuchan su propia respiración y la del caballo.

translation.en: And now, coming for the national Little Britches finals,
translation.es: Y, ahora, ingresa al ruedo para las finales nacionales de Little Britches

translation.en: this young lady is already standing near the top
translation.es: esta jovencita que calificó entre las mejores

translation.en: in the first round in all the categories.
translation.es: en la primera ronda de todas las categorías.

translation.en: On her way to legend status,
You gotta blast out of the alley,
translation.es: Hay que salir como una bala,

translation.en: pick up as much speed as possible before you cross the eye.
translation.es: tomar toda la velocidad posible antes de cruzar el ojo.

translation.en: Standard barrel pattern. Sixty feet to the first barrel.
translation.es: Patrón estándar de barriles. Veinte metros para el primero.

translation.en: Ninety feet to the second barrel. Crowd cheers me on.
translation.es: Treinta metros para el segundo. El público me alienta.

translation.en: A hundred and five to the third.
translation.es: Treinta y dos metros para el tercero.

translation.en: Dig in for that last sprint, the run home.
translation.es: Arremete con todo en el último tramo.
Tú y tu caballo deben darlo todo.
Tus piernas deben alentar sus piernas.

translation.en: That time decides who take it, a saddle, a buckle, or a long drive home.
translation.es: Ese tiempo lo decide todo: si te llevas el premio o vuelves a casa

translation.en: Nothing but failure on your mind.
And that run will cinch it. No one can catch her now.
translation.es: Esa corrida fue un éxito. Nadie podrá igualarla ahora.

translation.en: We now have a new Little Britches All- Around Champion,
translation.es: Tenemos una nueva campeona para Little Britches,

translation.en: just one- tenth off her personal best.
translation.es: apenas a un décimo de su mejor marca.

translation.en: One- tenth! I should have pushed him harder.
Am, you won! You pulled a check.
Should have been faster on that second barrel.
translation.es: Debí acelerar más en el segundo barril.

translation.en: Mom, I'm not fast enough if I'm gonna go pro.
translation.es: Mamá, no es suficiente si quiero ser profesional.

translation.en: I know, but can we just enjoy this for a minute, for one minute?
translation.es: Ya sé, pero ¿podemos disfrutar esto durante un minuto?

translation.en: Now, go pick up your saddle and congratulate Autumn. Your sister won the all- around too.
translation.es: Ve por tu montura y felicita a Autumn. Tu hermana también ganó.

translation.en: - - Yeah! Get over here, you little winner!
- Come on! Bring it home! - Keep going!
17.4! These are great times, Am. He is so fast.
translation.es: Hiciste 17,4. Excelente tiempo, Am. Es muy rápido.

translation.en: Yeah, we can shave some off of that.
Gotta make him pay attention. Tell him where to go.
translation.es: Debes hacer que esté atento. Dile a dónde ir.

translation.en: Gotta get him snappier on the backside.
- Use those legs. - Got it, Mom.
You sure you can leave him?
You two are working so well together.
Mamacita, it's two weeks working retail at the National Western Stock Show.
translation.es: Mamacita, son dos semanas de trabajo en la National Western Stock Show.

translation.en: I need that money for my pro permit.
translation.es: Necesito dinero para mi licencia de profesional.

translation.en: Hey, you really tightened the pocket on that last barrel.
translation.es: Oye, sí que aceleraste en el segundo barril.

translation.en: You can stay on that when you get back. All right.
translation.es: - Puedes seguir practicando a tu regreso. - Bien.

translation.en: We have our leadership conference coming up.
translation.es: Se acerca nuestra charla de liderazgo.

translation.en: This is important. Future Farmers of America is...
translation.es: Es importante. Los Futuros Agricultores de América...

translation.en: Amberley, the world can revolve without you.
translation.es: Amberley, el mundo podrá girar sin ti.

translation.en: - Emmy, this is our ticket to scholarships. - Scholarships.
translation.es: - Emmy, es nuestro boleto a las becas. - Becas.
Lo sé. La universidad de Utah South.

translation.en: Speaking of, are you still going?
translation.es: Hablando de eso, ¿aún vas a ir?

translation.en: I mean, do I need to look for a new roommate?
I can rodeo and go to school.
You're hardly home as it is.
You missed all your sister's rodeos, every one of your brother's ballgames.
translation.es: Te pierdes los rodeos y los partidos de tus hermanos.

translation.en: - True. - Yeah, why am I watching you, and you don't repay the favor?
translation.es: - Cierto. - Sí, yo voy a verte, pero tú no a mí.

translation.en: I pitched a three- hitter last week.
translation.es: La semana pasada permití solo tres batazos.

translation.en: You wouldn't know that, now would you?
Am, please take my truck. This old F- 150 can get super squirrely.
translation.es: Am, por favor, llévate mi camioneta. Esta vieja F-150 es complicada.

translation.en: I've been driving it all over Utah.
Well, that doesn't make me like it.
translation.es: Eso no hace que a mí me agrade.

translation.en: How about if I drive you to Denver, and then I'll take a plane back?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si te llevo hasta Denver y vuelvo en avión?

translation.en: you've had me at this my whole life.
translation.es: Me has acompañado toda mi vida.

translation.en: I could ride a horse before I could walk.
translation.es: Aprendí a montar antes de caminar.

translation.en: If we play this right, we have a real shot at Rookie of the Year.
translation.es: Si sale bien, tendré chances como Novata del año.

translation.en: I could even make a run at The American.
translation.es: Hasta podría llegar a The American.

translation.en: What I know is I can't stop you.
translation.es: Lo que sé es que no puedo detenerte.

translation.en: Can't go out there and hit the ball for them.
translation.es: No puedo salir a batear por ellos.

translation.en: Yeah, managing is different than playing, huh?
translation.es: Sí, dirigir no es lo mismo que jugar, ¿no?

translation.en: Riding Power one more time before you go?
translation.es: ¿Montarás a Poder una vez más antes de irte?

translation.en: You know I've got you in my heart.
translation.es: Sabes que te llevo en el corazón.

translation.en: And I'll be home next month. I know.
translation.es: - Y volveré a casa el próximo mes. - Lo sé, lo sé.

translation.en: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
translation.es: El esfuerzo le gana al talento si el talento no se esfuerza.

translation.en: Hey, why don't you let me brush Power, and I'll put him away, and then you can hit the road?
translation.es: ¿Quieres que lo cepille y lo lleve, así vas saliendo?

translation.en: No, we got riding to do.
text me when you stop for gas.
Text me when you stop for food.
I want you to call me when you get to the hotel obviously.
- Call me in the morning when you wake up. - 'Cita, chill.
translation.es: - Llámame cuando te despiertes. - Cita, calma.

translation.en: I know. It's just my baby girl has grown up, and...
translation.es: Lo sé, es que mi hija creció y...

translation.en: Come on, Power. You and me.
translation.es: Vamos, Poder. Solo tú y yo.

translation.en: We're on I- 80 east of Rawlins.
translation.es: Estamos en la Interestatal 80, al este de Rawlins.

translation.en: Look, you gotta get here fast.
Maybe I should try to get up. No, don't move.
translation.es: - Debería intentar pararme. - No, no, no te muevas.

translation.en: My arm is tired. I need to lean on it.
translation.es: Se me cansó el brazo, necesito apoyarlo.

translation.en: There's a blue blanket in my front seat.
translation.es: Hay una manta azul en el asiento delantero.

translation.en: All right, miss, my name is Officer Brad Shervick.
translation.es: Bien, señorita, soy el oficial Brad Shervick.

translation.en: You've been in an accident, okay? What city do you live in?
translation.es: Tuviste un accidente. ¿De qué ciudad eres?
El teléfono de mi mamá es 801-724...
Bien. Estás alerta, eso es bueno.

translation.en: You got a pretty good cut on your forehead.
translation.es: Tienes un corte profundo en la frente.

translation.en: I need to call my dad.
Am, it's going to be okay.
translation.es: Am, todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: Yeah, you need to call Mom and tell her, okay?
translation.es: Sí, llama a mamá y avísale, ¿sí?

translation.en: You're alive. You're talking to me.
Miss, I'm gonna need you to put the phone away
translation.es: Señorita, necesito que deje el teléfono y se concentre en mí.

translation.en: and concentrate on me. You can call him back.
translation.es: Señorita, necesito que deje el teléfono y se concentre en mí. Luego lo llama.

translation.en: Hey, Dad, the paramedics are here, so I gotta go.
translation.es: Papá, llegaron los paramédicos, debo colgar.

translation.en: Sir, your daughter is conscious and alert at the moment.
translation.es: Señor, su hija está consciente y alerta por ahora.

translation.en: That's all I can tell you.
We're going to be taking her to Carbon County Memorial at Rawlins.
translation.es: Irá al hospital Carbon Memorial, en Rawlins.

translation.en: I'm gonna stabilize you and pull you forward a little bit, so please just try to remain calm and still.
translation.es: Te enderezaré y te traeré hacia adelante, así que mantente calmada y quieta.

translation.en: never been in a hospital. I've never had an IV.
translation.es: nunca me internaron, nunca tuve una intravenosa.

translation.en: Well, you're about to have a lot of them.
translation.es: Bueno, estás a punto de ver mucho de eso.

translation.en: I'm gonna pull you forward, okay?
Put your mom on the phone.
- Dad, what's wrong? - Put your mom on the phone.
translation.es: - Papá, ¿qué pasa? - Pásame con tu mamá.

translation.en: I'm going to Rawlins. I'm going to the hospital in Rawlins.
translation.es: A Rawlins, al hospital de Rawlins.
- Debo ir. - Mamá, no estás vestida.

translation.en: You don't even have shoes on.
I'm gonna go get some clothes.
I'm gonna call Stacey. She's gotta come with me.
translation.es: Voy a llamar a Stacey. Tiene que acompañarme.

translation.en: I need you to stay and take care of the family, okay?
translation.es: Necesito que te quedes y cuides a los demás, ¿sí?

translation.en: - I'll call Ashley. - I'm gonna go kiss my babies.
translation.es: - Llamaré a Ashley. - Les daré un beso a mis bebés.

translation.en: Single MVA victim with possible severe spine injury.
translation.es: Accidentada con posible lesión en la columna.

translation.en: Patient awake and alert. I need vitals.
translation.es: Está alerta. Veamos sus signos vitales.

translation.en: They're flying her to Casper Wyoming Med.
translation.es: La llevarán a Casper, al Centro Médico de Wyoming.

translation.en: They have the best doctors there.
I'll text you when I know more. Thanks.
translation.es: Te escribo cuando sepa más. Gracias.

translation.en: Thank you, Stacey. Thank you for this.
Tina, you're family. Anything you need, I'm here.
translation.es: Tina, eres de la familia. Estoy para lo que necesites.

translation.en: Am texted me this sunrise this morning.
translation.es: Am me mandó este amanecer esta mañana.

translation.en: It had to be right before the...
I didn't tell her that I loved her.
translation.es: No le dije que la quería.

translation.en: I'll be with you on that plane to Casper.
translation.es: Te acompañaré en el vuelo a Casper.

translation.en: - That can't be... - Oh, Tina! Oh, no!
Stacey, pull over. Stacey, pull the car over!

translation.es: Es la camioneta de mi hija.

translation.en: - I'm looking for my daughter. - Ma'am!
Hi. I'm looking for Amberley Snyder. I'm her mother.
translation.es: Hola. Busco a Amberley Snyder. Soy la madre.

translation.en: She just got out of surgery. The doctor will update you.
translation.es: Recién terminó la cirugía. Le darán el parte.

translation.en: - We've done what we can. - Okay.
We had to open up her spine and attach two titanium rods
translation.es: Abrimos la columna y pusimos dos barras de titanio

translation.en: Mrs. Snyder, your daughter's T12 vertebrae was crushed,
translation.es: Señora Snyder, la vértebra T12 quedó destrozada.

translation.en: causing severe spinal cord injury. We pieced together what we could.
translation.es: Eso causó una lesión grave. Reconstruimos lo que pudimos.

translation.en: I don't know what that means.
It appears that the spinal cord isn't completely severed.
translation.es: Parece que la columna no quedó del todo dañada.

translation.en: Well, Mrs. Snyder, even with that,
she'll be confined to a wheelchair for the rest of her life.
translation.es: pasará el resto de su vida en una silla de ruedas.

translation.en: You don't know my Am. You don't know her, so...
translation.es: Usted no conoce a mi Am. No la conoce, así que...

translation.en: Mrs. Snyder, the paralysis, it's permanent.
translation.es: Señora Snyder, la parálisis es permanente.

translation.en: Please can you just stop and take me to her right now?
- Please just take me to my daughter. - Yes, ma'am, right this way.
translation.es: - Lléveme con mi hija. - Sí, señora, por aquí.

translation.en: If you need anything, we'll be right outside.
I'm sorry it took me so long to get here.
translation.es: Perdona que me tardé tanto en llegar.

translation.en: God, please make my child whole.

translation.es: Por favor. Por favor, ayuda a mi bebé.

translation.en: and the kids are inside opening presents, and we're missing it.
translation.es: Los niños están abriendo regalos y nos lo estamos perdiendo.

translation.en: Cold is not good for horses. They need to be warmed up.
translation.es: El frío no les hace bien a los caballos. Deben entrar en calor.

translation.en: - They all got rode this morning. - Really?
That's a lot of horse for a little girl.
translation.es: Es mucho caballo para una niña.

translation.en: I got you. I got you, baby.
translation.es: Yo me ocupo. Yo me ocupo, linda.

translation.en: I got you. Look at you. You're up.
translation.es: Yo me ocupo. Mírate, estás despierta.

translation.en: I'm so happy to see you.
Daddy is coming. Everybody is so, so excited to see you.
translation.es: Papá está en camino. Los demás también. Quieren verte.

translation.en: Honey, I'm sorry. You're paralyzed, baby.
translation.es: Cariño, lo siento. Quedaste paralítica, nena.

translation.en: It's gonna be okay. I promise.
- No! - I know. I'm so sorry.
We both have to keep it together when we're in there, but...
translation.es: Somos fuertes cuando estamos con ella, pero...

translation.en: I don't know. It's so hard.
I got a call from the insurance company.
They said now that Am is through with her operations...
translation.es: Dicen que, como ya terminaron las operaciones...

translation.en: That's great. Now, she can go into rehab.
Except... she can only be transported by air.
translation.es: Excepto que... deben transportarla por aire.

translation.en: They won't pay to fly her back to Provo.
translation.es: No pagarán el vuelo a Provo.

translation.en: It's 25 grand, and I'm not playing for the Dodgers.
translation.es: Son $25.000 y ya no juego para los Dodgers.

translation.en: It's six weeks. Rehab is six weeks. She has to be by her family.
translation.es: Son seis semanas de rehabilitación. Necesita a su familia.

translation.en: I'm not really in the mood, Mom.
That they don't know who or what they're dealing with.
translation.es: Que no saben con quién están tratando.

translation.en: I'm full of steel. You're not going to hurt me.
translation.es: Estoy llena de acero. No vas a lastimarme.

translation.en: She's got a drive like I never had.
Looks like that girls is not stopping till she gets to the NFR.
translation.es: Parece que no se detendrá hasta llegar a las nacionales.

translation.en: National Finals? She's got college in the fall.
translation.es: ¿Las nacionales? Irá a la universidad en otoño.

translation.en: We start Saturday morning. Be here at 7:00 a.m.
translation.es: Empezamos el sábado por la mañana. Ven a las 7 a. m.

translation.en: Everybody is here to see you.
Mom, I can't. I'm too tired.
Please just get me out of here.
- Cory, who are all these people? -
They're all here to support our girl.
MLB Players' Assistance Team, they donated to pay for the flight.
translation.es: La fundación Baseball Assistance Team donó el dinero para el vuelo.

translation.en: Yeah, they helped with this also.
she can't handle that right now. I gotta get her to the hospital.
translation.es: no puede con eso ahora, debe ir al hospital.

translation.en: I'll take care of it, kid.
You're a good man, Cory Snyder.
translation.es: Eres un buen hombre, Cory Snyder.

translation.en: Oh, no, sweet pea, we must rotate our body every two hours,
translation.es: No, preciosa, debemos rotarte cada dos horas

translation.en: or we will get pressure sores, and we don't want that.
translation.es: o tendremos llagas por presión, y no queremos eso.

translation.en: Somebody needs to roll you too?
Why don't you show me how to do that?
Now, no, what would you have me do if I showed you how to do my job?
translation.es: No, ¿qué voy a hacer yo si te enseño a hacer mi trabajo?

translation.en: Well, I'm here 24/7. I can haul 100 bales of hay.
translation.es: Estoy aquí todo el tiempo y puedo mover 100 fardos de heno.

translation.en: I can handle this. Mom, you gotta go work the horses.
translation.es: - Yo puedo. - Mamá, ocúpate de los caballos.

translation.en: Well, you don't need to stay here.
translation.es: No hace falta que te quedes.
Oye, no me iré a ningún lado.

translation.en: Face it. You're stuck with me.
I'll check in on you later.
We are going to get ourselves right out of your hair.
Sometimes a little tough to see.
Come on, Am. Let's go! Dig!
That puts Amberley Snyder in second place. Give her a round of applause.
translation.es: Amberley Snyder queda en segundo puesto. Un aplauso para ella.

translation.en: You got some work to do.
We should have beaten that time. Power really fought me.
translation.es: Debimos haber hecho mejor tiempo. Poder no me hacía caso.

translation.en: You want to be the best,
we want to build up our strength and our balance.
translation.es: Queremos trabajar la fuerza y el equilibrio.

translation.en: Go ahead and lock your wheels for me.
And you can go ahead and lift your legs out of your leg rests.
translation.es: Intenta quitar las piernas de los reposapiés.

translation.en: Now, some tools that really help us to speed along our work:
translation.es: Ahora, herramientas que ayudarán a lograr lo que queremos:

translation.en: So, let's start with the easy ones. What are things you see yourself doing?
translation.es: Empecemos con lo fácil. ¿Qué cosas te ves haciendo?

translation.en: My daughter, not one to hold back.
So, what we wanna do is we wanna get into a standing position.
translation.es: Lo que haremos será ponernos de pie.

translation.en: So, go ahead and grab a bar with each arm, okay?
translation.es: Toma una barra con cada mano, ¿sí?

translation.en: You're gonna use that upper body strength to pull yourself up.
translation.es: Y usa la fuerza del torso para subir.

translation.en: Now, this first time, I'm gonna be doing the majority of the work, all right?
translation.es: Esta primera vez, yo haré gran parte de la fuerza, ¿sí?

translation.en: So, on the count of three, we're gonna rock,
translation.es: A la cuenta de tres, nos balanceamos...

translation.en: and we're gonna get you up.
Mom, Diego is touching my butt.
translation.es: Mamá, Diego me está tocando el trasero.

translation.en: Nope, these are your hips. I'm at your hips.
translation.es: No, esa es tu cadera. Estoy en la cadera.

translation.en: Diego, it looks like you're touching my daughter's butt.
translation.es: Diego, parece que le estás tocando el trasero.

translation.en: Ma'am, this is part of what we have...
translation.es: Señora, esto es parte de lo que...

translation.en: I see how it is here. You two are funny.
translation.es: Ya entiendo qué pasa. Qué graciosas.

translation.en: All right, I'm putting you down, all right? Come on.
you're gonna do the majority of the work.
translation.es: tú harás gran parte de la fuerza.

translation.en: You might not get standing all the way up, and that's okay.
translation.es: Quizás no logres pararte, eso está bien.

translation.en: We just want to build up that upper body strength, okay?
translation.es: Queremos ganar fuerza en la parte superior.

translation.en: All right, same thing. We're gonna go on the count of three.
translation.es: Bueno, lo mismo. Vamos a la cuenta de tres.

translation.en: Give it all you got. Ready?
Yep, try to stand. Come on.
We're gonna make a little progress every day, yeah?
We're gonna do this together, okay? You gotta wait for me.

translation.es: Bien, a la cuenta de tres.

translation.en: There you go. You go this. Keep going.
translation.es: Eso es. Tú puedes. Un poco más.

translation.en: No, she's doing really good. Do you wanna stop?
- Get the door? - Okay, baby. Okay.
translation.es: - Cierra la puerta. - Está bien, linda, bueno.

translation.en: Your dad is getting everything ready at the house.
translation.es: Tu papá está preparando todo en casa.

translation.en: He's even putting in a custom elevator in the pantry.
translation.es: Incluso está instalando un ascensor en la despensa.

translation.en: And Autumn is so excited to see you. Everyone is.
translation.es: Y Autumn se muere por verte. Los demás también.

translation.en: Oh, and before I forget, this kid, Tate Watkins, keeps emailing.
translation.es: Y, antes de que me olvide, un tal Tate Watkins te escribe siempre.

translation.en: You had that FFA speech scheduled for the end of next month.
translation.es: La charla era a finales del próximo mes.

translation.en: You have to cancel it. I can't.
No, yeah. I mean, that's what I told him.
translation.es: No, sí. Quiero decir, eso le dije.

translation.en: But this kid is funny. He really wants you there.
translation.es: Pero este chico es raro. Insiste en que vayas.

translation.en: He said he's going to be re- schedule it for when you get better.
translation.es: Dijo que la reprogramaría cuando te recuperes.

translation.en: Oh! When am I gonna get better?
I'm not going in this thing.
Dad is picking up Taylor and Aubrey. Yeah, they'll be here in, like, 15 minutes.
translation.es: - Papá fue por Taylor y Aubrey. - Sí, llegarán como en 15 minutos.

translation.en: I got right back on him.
Okay, it's all in the technique.
translation.es: Bien, lo importante es la técnica.

translation.en: You want to grab on the push rim as far back as you can without overextending your shoulders.
translation.es: Empujas los aros tanto como puedas sin forzar los hombros.

translation.en: When you're first starting out, you can cheat a little bit - and grab the tire and-- - Okay!
translation.es: Para empezar, hay un truco: tomar la rueda y el aro.

translation.en: Really? You think you can do better?
- Are you challenging me? - Yes, I am.
- It's on. - Show him, Am. Show him.
Am! Am! Am! You got it! You got this.
- I can do it. - You got it.
- I can do it. - I got you. It's okay. Let go.
translation.es: - Yo puedo. - Te tengo, está bien. Suéltate.

translation.en: Look, it's not just about your arms. It's about your balance too.
translation.es: No solo son los brazos, es el equilibrio también.

translation.en: You've been using your legs to balance your entire life.
translation.es: Toda tu vida usaste las piernas para eso.

translation.en: Now, as you start to do more stuff for yourself,
you're gonna find things that once came naturally are now difficult,
translation.es: verás que lo que era natural ahora es difícil, y está bien.

translation.en: and that's okay. That's what we're gonna work through.
translation.es: verás que lo que era natural ahora es difícil, y está bien. En eso vamos a trabajar.

translation.en: Diego tells me you canceled therapy.
translation.es: Diego me dijo que cancelaste la terapia.

translation.en: I'm stuck in that chair for the rest of my life.
translation.es: Tendré que usar esa silla el resto de mi vida.

translation.en: Okay, I know. I get it.
I am so sick of you feeling sorry for yourself.
translation.es: Estoy harta de que sientas pena por ti.

translation.en: How long did it take you and Power to put together a good barrel run?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto pasó hasta que tú y Poder lograron una buena corrida?

translation.en: - But that's different! - No, it's not.
Now, get in. You're going to therapy.
translation.es: Ahora, súbete. Vas a ir a terapia.

translation.en: Diego said you were having balance issues.
translation.es: Diego dijo que tenías problemas con el equilibrio.

translation.en: Remember where your balance was best?
We both know that you were best in the saddle.
translation.es: Sabemos que te sientes mejor en una montura.

translation.en: Am, if it's not to ride again, so be it.
translation.es: Am, si no vuelves a montar, está bien.

translation.en: But it won't be because you didn't try.
translation.es: Pero no será porque no lo hayas intentado.

translation.en: Use your upper body position to find your balance.
When I come back, you better have those shoes on.
translation.es: Más te vale que te calces.

translation.en: You better be glad that missed.
You know, that boy is trying my last damn nerve.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Ese chico pone a prueba mi paciencia.

translation.en: He refuses to talk to anyone.
But I know it's not fine.
translation.es: Pero sé que no significa bien.

translation.en: And I know it's not good. I mean...
translation.es: Y sé que no es bueno, es decir...

translation.en: all they wanted to hear was that I was fine.
translation.es: ...solo querían escucharme decir que estaba bien.

translation.en: inside, I knew how bad it was.
translation.es: ...por dentro, sé lo mal que estuve.

translation.en: I used to feel that way.
I can't do anything for myself anymore.
translation.es: Ya no puedo hacer nada sola.

translation.en: I used to throw a saddle on my horse and ride all day.
translation.es: Solía ensillar a mi caballo y montar todo el día.

translation.en: Got better for me when I started therapy
- Not doing therapy. - Not forcing you.
translation.es: - No haré terapia. - Nadie te obliga.

translation.en: You're still never gonna walk again.
I am gonna get on a horse again.
translation.es: Volveré a subirme a un caballo.

translation.en: Eight seconds on a bull, but...
translation.es: Ocho segundos sobre un toro, pero...

translation.en: Everybody got their money for the lotto? We are going to win this time.
translation.es: ¿Todos tienen el dinero para la lotería? Vamos a ganar esta vez.

translation.en: Wow, well... you've been a handful.
Honey, this is what I've been blessed with.
Now, you go on home and get your glory.
translation.es: Ahora, ve a casa y consigue la gloria.

translation.en: Felice, thank you. We never could have done this without you.
translation.es: Felice, gracias. No habríamos podido hacerlo sin ti.

translation.en: And remember that going up is your biggest threat, okay?
- Get that momentum. Pop a wheelie-- - I know.
translation.es: - Aprovecha el impulso y... - Ya sé, ya sé.

translation.en: no matter what life gives you...
translation.es: ...no importa qué te dé la vida...

translation.en: So, why don't we talk about the things that you see yourself doing?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me cuentas  qué te ves haciendo?

translation.en: 'Cause if we have a goal, you keep picturing it in your mind,
translation.es: Necesitamos una meta, algo que te imagines,

translation.en: you can stay focused on it.
Mom, I don't think I'm ready for this.
translation.es: Mamá, no sé si estoy lista para esto.

translation.en: No one is home, right? Just your dad. Ashley took everyone to dinner.
translation.es: - No hay nadie, ¿cierto? - Solo tu papá. Ashley los llevó a cenar.

translation.en: - Hey, you wanna get that chair? - Sure.
I'm headed out. I've gotta go pick up Aubrey from dance.
translation.es: Voy a salir. Debo recoger a Aubrey de danza.

translation.en: I wish I could saddle you up and just go for a ride, you and me.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera ensillarte y hacer una corrida, solo tú y yo.

translation.en: Go on and leave a message, and you have a blessed day.
translation.es: Deja un mensaje y que tengas un buen día.

translation.en: Hey, Mom, just curious when you're coming home.
translation.es: Hola, mamá. Solo quería saber cuándo vas a volver.

translation.en: Look at that. My plan worked. Leaving the horses out.
translation.es: Mira, funcionó mi plan de dejar los caballos afuera.

translation.en: I was waving you over. I was stuck. You couldn't tell?
translation.es: Te hice señales. Me atasqué. ¿No te diste cuenta?

translation.en: I was so happy to see you with those horses.
translation.es: Me alegré al verte con los caballos. No lo noté.

translation.en: - I just... I didn't know. - Just--
translation.es: Me alegré al verte con los caballos. No lo noté. Ya... déjame sola.
y no me iré a ningún lado.

translation.en: And I'm going to be here for both of us until you can be there for yourself.
translation.es: Estaré contigo por las dos hasta que puedas estar por ti sola.

translation.en: If I have to strap you in that saddle myself.
translation.es: Así sea que yo misma deba atarte a la montura.

translation.en: Are you seriously asking me that?
Yeah, Amberley! - Woo! - Come on, Am.
- Yeah, Am! - You got this, Am!
What's wrong? Don't you wanna go in the arena?
Hey, you'll have to give this a chance.
It's never gonna be the same.
I could tell the second I got up here.
translation.es: Lo supe en cuanto me subí.

translation.en: There's nothing I can do about it.
translation.es: No hay nada que pueda hacer.

translation.en: - Am... - Just get me off this thing.
All right, that's gonna be enough for today.
No, I wanna see you ride more.  Maybe another time.
translation.es: - Quiero verla un poco más. - Quizás otro día.

translation.en: You know that was just the first time out, right?
translation.es: Sabes que apenas fue la primera vez, ¿no?

translation.en: I still see the same girl I knew before the accident.
translation.es: ...aún veo a la misma chica de antes del accidente.

translation.en: The Amberley I know wouldn't be beaten until she'd done absolutely everything she could first.
translation.es: La Amberley que conozco haría todo lo posible antes de dejarse vencer.

translation.en: She's hardly been down here with the horses.
translation.es: No viene seguido a ver a los caballos.

translation.en: Autumn, you gotta give her some time.
Until then, these horses aren't gonna clean up after themselves.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, estos caballos no se limpiarán solos.

translation.en: Go on. Go get the wheelbarrow.
Why won't you leave me alone?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dejas en paz?

translation.en: Yeah, you need to stop emailing me.
and you need to stop reminding me of stuff I can't do. I'm not going.
translation.es: y no necesito que me recuerdes lo que no puedo hacer. No voy a ir.

translation.en: Sitting third in the standings for our circuit.
Before, every time on a horse,
translation.es: Antes, cada vez que me subía a un caballo,

translation.en: it felt like the most natural thing in the world.
translation.es: se sentía como lo más natural del mundo.

translation.en: I can't do the one thing that I love to do.
translation.es: No puedo hacer lo único que amo hacer.

translation.en: Maybe you could do something other than rodeo.
translation.es: Tal vez puedas hacer otra cosa.
El rodeo no es algo que hago.

translation.en: Really, it's who I am. It's like...
translation.es: Es lo que soy. Es como...

translation.en: I just gotta find a way to wrap my mind around this new reality.
translation.es: Solo debo encontrar una forma de aceptar esta nueva realidad.

translation.en: Am, I'm home! Come on outside.
Doctor said you should be ready to start driving.
translation.es: El médico dijo estabas lista para manejar.

translation.en: It's set up with hand controls and everything.
But a truck? What? Mom, I can handle this.
translation.es: - Pero ¿una camioneta? - ¿Qué? Mamá, yo puedo con esto.

translation.en: Let me show you how it works. Yeah, I got it.
translation.es: - Te mostraré cómo funciona. - Sí, entiendo.

translation.en: Are you sure you don't want us to go with you?
♪ Odds are, you don't beat the odds ♪ ♪ But they don't know the thing we've got... ♪
It's all about keeping my balance.
A seatbelt on a saddle. That is a new one on me.
translation.es: Un cinturón de seguridad en una montura. Eso es nuevo.

translation.en: Well, I figure you can attach it behind the cantle.
translation.es: Imagino que podrías asegurarlo detrás del borrén trasero.

translation.en: You think you can do that?
A seatbelt, it's what put me in this chair.
translation.es: Un cinturón de seguridad es lo que me puso en esta silla.

translation.en: It might be what gets me out.
translation.es: Quizá también me saque de ella.

translation.en: I know it's new now, but...
Ready to be my legs, bubba?
Sweetest bale of hay I ever tossed.
translation.es: El fardo más dulce que levanté.

translation.en: Let's take it easy. I'm still not sold on this seat belt.
translation.es: Despacio. Aún no confío en el cinturón.
Cita, ten un poco de fe.

translation.en: You're gonna have to make him work without leg cues.
translation.es: Tendrás que enseñarle a correr sin señales de piernas.

translation.en: I get this down, and I can start training again.
translation.es: En cuanto me acostumbre, puedo volver a entrenar.

translation.en: I was talking to Stacey, and we had this idea.
translation.es: Hablando con Stacey, se nos ocurrió una idea.

translation.en: To get me ready to run?
Hey, Am, you have the gift. You've had it since before you could even walk, but...
translation.es: Am, tienes un don. Lo tienes desde que gateabas, pero...

translation.en: Yes, but you could also coach.
Stacey says that she needs you. You could help her with the kids.
translation.es: Stacey dice que te necesita. Podrías ayudarla.

translation.en: - Autumn is working with her now. - Oh, good for her!
translation.es: - Autumn está trabajando con ella. - ¡Me alegro!

translation.en: Yeah, but it might be a good way to just get you--
translation.es: Sí, pero sería un buen modo de...

translation.en: Stacey needs you. Autumn needs you.
translation.es: Stacey te necesita. Autumn te necesita.

translation.en: You could take those riders to a new level.
translation.es: Sacarías lo mejor de esas jinetes.

translation.en: What? You're telling me that God wants me like this?
translation.es: ¿Qué, dices que esto es lo que Dios quiere para mí?

translation.en: No, honey, I think he wants what's best for you.
translation.es: No, linda, creo que quiere lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: Well, then why did he give me this talent and then yank it away?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿por qué me dio este talento y luego lo tiró?

translation.en: And why did he give me a mother that doesn't believe in me
translation.es: ¿Y por qué me dio una madre que no cree en mí

translation.en: and treats me like a cripple?
Wait. That's not what I meant.
- Take Lacey. Put her away. - Okay.
That coaching idea was wrong. I shouldn't have said--
translation.es: Fue mala idea. No debí decir...

translation.en: You don't mean that. I'm done.
translation.es: - No hablas en serio. - Me cansé.

translation.en: Hey, it's just gonna take some time.
If I can't ride like I used to, I never wanna ride again.
translation.es: Si no puedo montar como antes, no quiero hacerlo nunca más.

translation.en: It kills me that I can't fix this.
translation.es: Me mata no poder cambiar esto.

translation.en: I should have died in that crash.
translation.es: Debí haber muerto en el accidente.

translation.en: Hey, don't you say that! Don't you dare say that!
translation.es: ¡No digas eso! ¡No te atrevas a decir eso!

translation.en: I thank God every day that you are here.
translation.es: ¡Agradezco todos los días que estés aquí!

translation.en: And I know that everything is different.
translation.es: Y sé que todo es distinto,

translation.en: But we're just gonna have to find a new way to live with this.
translation.es: pero tendremos que encontrar la forma de vivir con esto.

translation.en: This chair will either be your wings, or it will be your anchor.
translation.es: Esta silla puede ser tus alas o tu ancla.
Presidente de Futuros Agricultores de América,

translation.en: You gonna say it like that?
I haven't done this a lot.
I put in all the rodeo stuff, like winning Little Britches.
translation.es: Menciono tus rodeos, como tu victoria en Little Britches.

translation.en: Yeah. Two saddles, finals, and world.
translation.es: Sí, dos monturas, las finales y la mundial.

translation.en: Listen, if I suck up there, you can boo me off the stage.
translation.es: Si lo hago mal, puedes abuchearme para que baje.

translation.en: Oh, my God! I didn't think! I swear!
translation.es: Dios mío, no me di cuenta. Lo juro.

translation.en: There are some goals that may be out of my grasp for now.
translation.es: Hay metas que, por ahora, están muy fuera de mi alcance.

translation.en: I'm working on new goals, new dreams.
translation.es: Estoy trabajando en metas nuevas, sueños nuevos.

translation.en: I start Utah South in two weeks.
translation.es: Empezaré la universidad en dos semanas.

translation.en: I've learned we don't always get to choose what happens to us,
translation.es: Aprendí que no siempre podemos elegir lo que nos pasa,

translation.en: but we do get to choose what we do next.
translation.es: pero sí podemos elegir qué haremos luego.

translation.en: Most importantly, we never give up.
translation.es: Más aún, nunca debemos darnos por vencidos.

translation.en: No matter what life gives you,
translation.es: No importa qué te dé la vida,

translation.en: I think I might just sit in on chemistry to see if I wanna...
translation.es: Creo que iré a la clase de química para ver si quiero...

translation.en: I don't think we're there yet.
Amberley, Jenna Walters from American Morning.
translation.es: Amberley, Jenna Walters, de Mañana Americana.

translation.en: Listen, we'd like to do a profile piece on you.
People really want to hear your story, and somebody told me you were back on your horse again.
translation.es: La gente quiere conocer tu historia, y supe que volviste a cabalgar.

translation.en: So we thought it would be very inspiring to people facing difficult situations.
translation.es: Pensamos que sería inspirador para quienes enfrentan dificultades.

translation.en: Yeah, I can ride him around a little.
I can be down there with my crew on Saturday.
translation.es: Puedo ir con mi equipo el sábado.

translation.en: You haven't been on your horse in two months.
translation.es: No montas desde hace dos meses.

translation.en: And the last time you were, you said you were never getting on your horse again.
translation.es: Y, la última vez, dijiste que no lo harías nunca más.

translation.en: I mean, are you up for this?
The doctors asked me what my goals were.
translation.es: Los médicos me preguntaron mis metas.

translation.en: Is there a future in rodeo?
Really, I'm the only one who can decide what I'm capable of.
translation.es: En realidad, soy la única que puede decidir de qué soy capaz.

translation.en: I've got a lot of work to do.
whatever life gives you, you've got three choices.
translation.es: ante lo que te da la vida, tienes tres opciones:

translation.en: You can either give up, give in, or give it your all.
translation.es: puedes dejar de esforzarte, rendirte o darlo todo.

translation.en: And I figured it was time that I gave it my all.
translation.es: Y yo decidí que era hora de darlo todo.

translation.en: It's an incredible story. We'll be watching for you.
translation.es: Es una historia increíble. Estaremos pendientes de ti.

translation.en: - That's it. I think we've got it. - Cool.
Let's just get some B- roll of her riding, okay?
I know. It's crazy. Jenna Walters is just sitting in our barn.
translation.es: Lo sé, es de no creer. Jenna Walters está en nuestro establo.

translation.en: Well, they're about to finish up,
and she's gonna get on Power, and I'm freaking out a little bit, so...
translation.es: Va a subirse a Poder, y eso me asusta un poco...

translation.en: Yes, Cory, I promise. I won't forget to breathe.
translation.es: Sí, Cory, lo prometo. No olvidaré respirar.

translation.en: - Amberley, you got this! - There you go.
I can't tell you what to do with my legs anymore.
translation.es: Ya no puedo darte señales con las piernas.

translation.en: Hey, you don't wanna miss this.
You got it, Am. Keep going.
- Come on, Am! - Come on, Am!
Mom, he's behaving like a prince.
Give it up for number 17, Jenny Watkins.
translation.es: JINETE Un aplauso para la número 17, Jenny Watkins.

translation.en: - Do you think Amberley will win? - Heck, yeah!
What if she falls? She gets hurt?
translation.es: ¿Y si se cae y se lastima?

translation.en: Hey, I'm going nuts as it is.
Sorry. Somebody had to say it.
Am is just here for practice, see what she can do.
translation.es: Am vino a practicar, ver qué puede hacer.

translation.en: Yeah, well, she's gonna do great.
- She's put in the work. - She has.
You ask me, I say you haven't the sense God gave you!
translation.es: Si me preguntas, diría que te falta sentido común.

translation.en: Letting your handicapped child on a horse.
translation.es: Dejar cabalgar a tu hija discapacitada.

translation.en: What kind of a mother are you?
I'm gonna show you what kind of a mother I am.
translation.es: Te mostraré qué clase de madre soy.

translation.en: - That is none of your-- - Hey, it's all right.
Up next, we have a real comeback kid.
...ready to take her first run, Amberley Snyder on Power.
translation.es: ...está lista para su primera corrida, Amberley Snyder con Poder.

translation.en: they said you and I would never be back here.
translation.es: ...dijeron que tú y yo no podríamos volver jamás.

translation.en: 17.6 seconds. Good enough for second place.
translation.es: 17,6 segundos. Suficiente para el segundo puesto.

translation.en: What a ride, folks! What a ride!
Amberley Snyder, give it up for her one more time.
translation.es: Amberley Snyder, otro aplauso para ella.

translation.en: It feels like... I don't know.
Ashley took them all out for pizza.
translation.es: Ashley los llevó a comer pizza.

translation.en: Should be back in an hour or so.
I should be happy, and I am. I just... I mean, she's...
translation.es: Debería estar contenta. Y lo estoy, pero... está...

translation.en: and she's here, and she's back on the horse.
translation.es: está aquí y volvió a montar.

translation.en: But then I see her in that chair.
translation.es: Pero la veo en esa silla...

translation.en: I can't... I just can't do anything.
I can't fix her. I can't protect her.
translation.es: No puedo curarla. No puedo protegerla.

translation.en: Every time I look at her, it hits me.
translation.es: Cada vez que la miro, me choca.

translation.en: I told her not to take that truck. You know, I stood there with her.
translation.es: Le dije que no usara esa camioneta. Estuve parada ahí con ella.

translation.en: - And I let her go. - It's not your fault.
translation.es: - Y la dejé ir. - No es tu culpa.

translation.en: There's so many things she's never gonna be able to do, you know?
translation.es: Hay tantas cosas que nunca podrá hacer, ¿sabes?

translation.en: She's never gonna be able to walk down the aisle.
She's never gonna be able to run with her kids.
translation.es: Nunca podrá correr con sus hijos.

translation.en: She's not gonna have - the same opportunities-- - She has you.
translation.es: - Nunca tendrá las mismas opor... - Te tiene a ti.

translation.en: I say sky is the limit.
Mom, you know I can make a faster run.
translation.es: Mamá, sabes que puedo correr más rápido.

translation.en: I know, baby, but let's take it one rodeo at a time.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero vamos de a un rodeo por vez.
Aún se está recuperando, pero ya casi.

translation.en: Got word from Andrea Busby at Busby Quarter Horses.
translation.es: Me contactó Andrea Busby, de Busby Quarter Horses.

translation.en: They want to put you up for the Fan Favorite Exemption at The American this year.
translation.es: Te nominarán para Favorita de los fans en The American este año.

translation.en: It's a long shot, but they've been following your story,
translation.es: Es algo arriesgado, pero vienen siguiendo tu historia

translation.en: and they want to get it started for you.
Power, do you hear that? The American!
Power is ready. Not sure about you.
translation.es: Poder está listo. No sé tú.

translation.en: The American is as big as it gets.
translation.es: The American es la más importante.

translation.en: I guess we got work to do.
Less than a year after her truck accident,
translation.es: A menos de un año de su accidente,

translation.en: Amberley Snyder is back with a time of 17.7 seconds.
translation.es: Amberley Snyder vuelve con una marca de 17,7 segundos.

translation.en: She is up for the Fan Favorite Exemption at The American, and she is showing us why.
translation.es: La nominaron para Favorita de los fans y nos está demostrando por qué.

translation.en: That's a first- place finish for Amberley Snyder.
translation.es: Amberley Snyder obtiene el primer puesto.

translation.en: The American should make some room. Unbelievable.
translation.es: The American tendrá que hacer espacio. Increíble. RODEO STATELINE

translation.en: Give this little lady a round of applause.
translation.es: Denle a esta señorita un gran aplauso.

translation.en: And she's coming around the second barrel.
translation.es: RODEO BEST 'N THE WEST Rodea el segundo barril.

translation.en: That's gonna cost her a five- second penalty.
translation.es: Eso le costará una sanción de cinco segundos.

translation.en: Putting Amberley Snyder outside of our top five riders.
translation.es: lo que deja a Amberley Snyder fuera de las mejores cinco.

translation.en: - That was a little rough. - Yeah.
Well, you're gonna have to get him ready for regionals in Pocatello soon.
translation.es: Debes prepararlo para las regionales en Pocatello.

translation.en: We gotta get faster if I'm gonna go The American.
translation.es: Debemos mejorar el tiempo si quiero ir a The American.

translation.en: I must have just sat in something.
translation.es: Debo de haberme sentado en algo.

translation.en: That's the last one unless you wanna ride the donkey.
translation.es: Fue el último, salvo que quieras montar al burro.

translation.en: I do not know what is going on with you.
I don't know what kind of bug you got, but it's making you all wonky.
translation.es: No sé qué te picó, pero estás muy rara.

translation.en: I'm gonna go inside, and I'm gonna make you a protein smoothie.
translation.es: Iré adentro y te prepararé un batido de proteínas.

translation.en: You need to start taking better care of yourself. You know that?
translation.es: Debes empezar a cuidarte mejor. ¿Lo sabes?

translation.en: All right, give me your weight.
Those horses are getting hungry. Come on. Let's go.
translation.es: Los caballos tienen hambre. Vamos, andando.

translation.en: I'll meet you inside, all right?
Hey, Mom, I don't feel very--
- Mom, what can I do? - JC, go get the keys.
Autumn, open the door! Open the back door!
You've got a softball- sized ulcer that goes right down to the bone.
translation.es: Tienes una úlcera grande como una pelota y llega al hueso.

translation.en: I'll tell you, if you had waited two more days, you could have died.
translation.es: Les digo, si esperaban dos días más, podrías haber muerto.

translation.en: My kid is dying right in front of me. I don't even see it?
translation.es: ¿Mi hija se muere en mis narices y yo no lo veo?

translation.en: We've got her on IV antibiotics now, but we need to operate right away.
translation.es: Ya la estamos medicando por intravenosa, pero debemos operarla de inmediato.

translation.en: No, I've got two rodeos this weekend and a shot at The American.
translation.es: No, tengo dos rodeos esta semana y una chance de llegar a The American.

translation.en: This infection will kill you if we don't treat it now.
translation.es: Esta infección te matará si no la tratamos enseguida.

translation.en: You'll need intensive wound care and be on long- term antibiotics.
translation.es: Necesitarás tratamiento intensivo y antibióticos un tiempo.

translation.en: What? No, then I'm not doing it. I'm not doing it.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, entonces, no lo haré. No.

translation.en: Can I talk to my daughter alone, please?
Let me know now, and I'll get ready to bury my child, because this...
translation.es: Avísame, así me preparo para enterrar a mi hija, porque esto...

translation.en: I can't go through this again.
So if you wanna kill yourself,
you're gonna put me in that box right next to you.
translation.es: me pondrás en un cajón junto a ti.

translation.en: Why the hell did you not tell me?
Am, you just have to know your limits. No! It's all gonna go away!
translation.es: - Am, debes conocer tus límites. - ¡No! ¡Todo va a desaparecer!

translation.en: Everything changed in that one moment.
But then, I was me again. I was riding.
translation.es: Pero, luego, volví a ser yo misma. Volví a montar.

translation.en: And I was just afraid that if I told you,
translation.es: Y tenía miedo de que, si te lo decía,

translation.en: that if you knew, it would all go away.
translation.es: si tú lo sabías, todo desapareciera.

translation.en: One turkey sandwich, cheddar cheese and no crust.
translation.es: Un sándwich de pavo con queso cheddar y sin bordes.

translation.en: That's a ridiculous amount of fan mail.
I'm ten and live in San Antonio, Texas.
translation.es: Tengo 10 años y vivo en San Antonio, Texas.

translation.en: I got hit by a car and am in a wheelchair just like you.
translation.es: Me chocó un auto y estoy en silla de ruedas, como tú.

translation.en: I used to feel like giving up, but I see what you do, and it makes me want to try harder.
translation.es: Había bajado los brazos, pero te veo y me motiva a esforzarme.

translation.en: I can do great things too. Your fan, Brittany Carlson.
translation.es: También puedo lograr mucho. Tu fan, Brittany Carlson.

translation.en: What do you want me to write back?
Am, there are tons of more messages like that.
translation.es: Am, hay millones de mensajes como ese.

translation.en: Am, maybe you could help them.
Bubba, we're going to The American.
Come on. Let's go this way.
Mom, I should drive with you.
No, it's better you fly in tomorrow. My nerves are working enough.
translation.es: No, es mejor que vueles mañana. Ya estoy bastante nerviosa.

translation.en: I'll make sure she gets to the airport.
translation.es: Me aseguraré de que llegue al aeropuerto.

translation.en: Glad you got Legacy in there. Power travels better with company.
translation.es: Qué bueno que llevas a Legado. Poder viaja mejor con compañía.

translation.en: You haven't had enough time to get ready.
You've only run those barrels at competition- level three times.
translation.es: Solo practicaste tres veces los barriles de competición.

translation.en: Mom, we've been over this. I feel great.
translation.es: Mamá, ya lo hablamos. Me siento bien.

translation.en: Tina, we'll get her through a couple of runs before she leaves.
translation.es: Tina, practicaremos otro poco antes de que se vaya.

translation.en: And we'll train hard when we get to Texas.
It's turning into snow. I think I might have to stop for the night.
translation.es: Se está volviendo nieve. Creo que pararé esta noche.

translation.en: I'm sorry, honey. I know you need time to train.
translation.es: Lo siento, nena. Sé que necesitas entrenar.

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow night.Love you.
translation.es: Te veo mañana por la noche. Te quiero.

translation.en: I only have one more day.
at The American, in front of thousands of people,
translation.es: en The American, frente a miles de personas,

translation.en: that's gonna stick with me forever.
You know that I can't quit.
I remember the first time I saw you riding. I mean, really riding.
translation.es: Recuerdo la primera vez que te vi montar. Me refiero a montar de veras.

translation.en: You were maybe ten years old.
I was watching you, and I got jealous.
translation.es: Te vi y me dio envidia.

translation.en: Oh. Such a natural gift, even then.
translation.es: Ya entonces se veía ese don tan natural.

translation.en: the fact that you're even here after that accident...
translation.es: ...el hecho de que estés aquí luego del accidente...

translation.en: Honey, look how far you've taken yourself.
If I decide to go for it,
Well, then, I'm gonna be there for you.
translation.es: Bueno, entonces, allí estaré para ti.

translation.en: What are you doing here? I thought you had to work.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces aquí? Creí que tenías trabajo.

translation.en: My buddy, Justin, he's in the team roping competition.
translation.es: Así es. Mi amigo Justin vino a competir también.

translation.en: I'm just helping out with his horses.
Are you crazy? I wouldn't miss this for nothing.
translation.es: ¿Estás loca? No me lo perdería por nada.

translation.en: I gotta get you off there so Casey and Ryan can do final checks.
translation.es: Debo bajarte para que Casey y Ryan hagan el chequeo final.

translation.en: Of course. Let me help you.
You can put me down now.
I could do that all day.
translation.es: Podría hacer esto todo el día.

translation.en: You're the first person that has made me feel like I'm not in this chair.
translation.es: Eres el primero que no me hace sentir que estoy en silla de ruedas.

translation.en: - All right, I guess I should put you down. -
Welcome to the RFD- TV's The American,
translation.es: ESTADIO AT&T ARLINGTON, TEXAS Bienvenidos a la señal de The American, el rodeo de un día más rico de todos.

translation.en: the world's richest one- day rodeo.
translation.es: Bienvenidos a la señal de The American, el rodeo de un día más rico de todos.

translation.en: When the dust settles, the toughest competitors in the world will battle it out
translation.es: Cuando el polvo se asiente, los competidores más rudos lucharán

translation.en: to be the best of the best.
translation.es: por ser los mejores de todos.

translation.en: None of this would have happened without you.
I'm so proud of you, Am.
I mean, look where you are.
You may have lost the use of your legs...
but it's opened up your heart.
Now, remember. It's not about winning.
translation.es: Recuerda. Lo importante no es ganar.

translation.en: It's about the fact that you are here on this horse right now.
translation.es: Lo importante es que estás aquí sobre un caballo.

translation.en: Can it be a little about winning?
- Hi. I'm Tate. - Nice to meet you.
She's good. I'm freaking out, but...
translation.es: Ella está bien. Yo estoy nerviosa.

translation.en: but it's the same thing we always do.
translation.es: pero es lo mismo que hacemos siempre.

translation.en: we have a Fan Favorite coming up.
translation.es: ahora tenemos a la favorita de los fans.

translation.en: She's beaten incredible odds to get here.
translation.es: Superó muchos obstáculos para estar aquí.

translation.en: She's got a heart as big as Texas,
translation.es: Tiene un corazón grande como Texas:

translation.en: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
translation.es: La actitud es algo que marca la diferencia.

translation.en: I realize maybe I won't have control over every situation in my life.
translation.es: Entendí que quizás no controle cada situación de mi vida.

translation.en: Maybe I don't get to make every decision.
translation.es: Quizás no pueda tomar cada decisión.

translation.en: But when I wake up in the morning, I get to decide my attitude.
translation.es: Pero, cuando me despierto en la mañana, decido cuál será mi actitud.

translation.en: And if that's the only decision I get to make that day...
translation.es: Si es la única decisión que puedo tomar ese día...

translation.en: I better make it a good one.
who knows what you can achieve?
I can't believe what we just watched. I mean, that was amazing.
translation.es: No puedo creer lo que acabo de ver. ¡Sí que fue asombroso!

translation.en: That puts Amberley Snyder up on the board with some of the very best in rodeo.
translation.es: Eso deja a Amberley Snyder con uno de los mejores tiempos del rodeo.

translation.en: When the doctors asked what my goals were,
translation.es: Cuando los médicos me preguntaron mis metas,

translation.en: ...around the second barrel. It's just perfect.

translation.es: AMBERLEY OBTUVO LA GLORIA EN THE AMERICAN DE 2015.
AMBERLEY OBTUVO LA GLORIA EN THE AMERICAN DE 2015. Ahí viene Amberley Snyder

translation.en: and she's gonna be amongst them with a 15.369.
translation.es: y queda entre las mejores con 15,369.

translation.en: I'm telling you what. She played at a pro level here, girls.
translation.es: ¿Saben qué? Corrió como una profesional. SIGUE SIENDO UNA PROFESIONAL DEL RODEO

translation.en: Getting a standing ovation here at AT&T Stadium.
translation.es: SIGUE SIENDO UNA PROFESIONAL DEL RODEO Recibe una ovación de pie en el Estadio AT&T.

translation.en: ♪ Ain't life crazy ? ♪ ♪ I live it like a good ride ♪
translation.es: VIAJA POR EL PAÍS COMO ORADORA MOTIVACIONAL.

translation.en: ♪ I saddle up with it and smile at the sun ♪
translation.es: VIAJA POR EL PAÍS COMO ORADORA MOTIVACIONAL. AMBERLEY HIZO LAS ESCENAS DE RIESGO EN ESTA PELÍCULA,

translation.en: ♪ Let my wild dreams run ♪ ♪ My heart knows it's going the distance ♪
translation.es: AMBERLEY HIZO LAS ESCENAS DE RIESGO EN ESTA PELÍCULA,
JUNTO CON SU HERMANA AUTUMN Y SU CABALLO, PODER.

translation.en: ♪ And I ride ♪ ♪ Take the world by the reins ♪
